English: Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain `關中~`平原~|关`中~`平原~[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River `漢水~|汉`水~[Han4 shui3] valley

d.f: `山脈~`名~。`起~`自~`甘肅省~`天~`水~`縣~，`綿亙~`於~`陝西省~`南部~，`終於~`河南省~`陝~`縣~。`是~`長江~、`黃河~`兩~`大~`流域~`的~`分水嶺~，`也是~`我國~`地理~`上~`的~`天然~`界線~，`南北~`氣候~、`景觀~`不同~。

English: Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain `關中~`平原~|关`中~`平原~[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River `漢水~|汉`水~[Han4 shui3] valley
